name: Modal
author: Daniel Buchner, Arron Schaar
description: The modal element can be used to show notices or secondary content above the z-level of the page.

documentation.description: The modal element can be used to show notices or secondary content above the z-level of the page.

attributes.hidden: A boolean attribute that when present will hide the modal.
attributes.overlay: A boolean attribute that when present will create a transparant overlay behind the modal.
attributes.esc-hide: A boolean attribute that when present will allow the modal to be closed by pressed the escape key.
attributes.cancel-click-hide: If set, will prevent the modal from being dismissed by clicking outside its box.

events.modalhide: This event is fired when ESC key is pressed and will close the modal unless preventDefault is set.
